text: Where has your journey brought you... To me of course...
You're face to face with THE Wise Wizard.
Yes yes, hold your applause, please you are too kind!
What? Assist you on your quest? Simply I am too busy for trivial matters such as that!
I will tell you this however!
You're quest may only be completed if you can resolve all six time anomalies!
Do this, and the gates to your final battle will open!
